scene.name: scene_Lobby_IMG_6134_Panorama
scene.title: Lobby
scene.data: The main hall can accommodate all types of ceremonies, events, receptions, exhibitions.

scene.name: scene_Auditorium_IMG_5567_Panorama
scene.title: Auditorium Icosium
scene.data: 6000 seats capacity [br][br] a modular stage of more than 200 m² for any type of scenography. [br][br] - A central screen of 18m x 10m [br][br] - 2 side screens of 7,50m x 5m [br][br] - 8 screens of 2m x 1m all around the hall [br][br] In annex, boxes for the artists and the central control cabin.

scene.name: scene_Djemila_IMG_6091_Panorama
scene.title: Djemila Hall
scene.data: Djemila hall [br][br] - 705 seating capacity as assembly room, with equipments for translation and electronic voting[br][br] - 270 seating capacity as conference room[br][br] - 450 seating as banquet room[br][br]

scene.name: scene_Salle_de_Banquets_Sahara_IMG_6483_Panorama
scene.title: Banquet room Sahara
scene.data: Area : 3300m²[br][br] Capacity : 2500 guests[br][br] Can be divided into 3 separate rooms[br][br]

scene.name: scene_Salle_Polyvalente_2_IMG_2852_Panorama
scene.title: Multipurpose rooms
scene.data: - 06 multipurpose rooms with a seatings capacity from 172 to 320 seats[br][br] - Equipped with facilities for translation, data show, cameras and sound system

scene.name: scene_Bureaux_D__l__gations_IMG_5891_Panorama
scene.title: Delegations offices
scene.data: 61 offices are available to delegation for their meetings

scene.name: scene_Oasis_IMG_0062_Panorama
scene.title: Oasis restaurant
scene.data: Self service with a capacity of 740 guests [br][br] Area : 1400m²

scene.name: scene_Cherchell_IMG_0470_Panorama
scene.title: Cherchell Restaurant
scene.data: Cherchell restaurant on 2 levels with a capacity of 392 guests

scene.name: scene_Crepuscule_IMG_0229_Panorama
scene.title: Crépuscule restaurant
scene.data: Restaurant Crepuscule with a capacity of 102 guests with terrace and lounge cafeteria [br][br]

scene.name: scene_Hall_d_Exposition_IMG_6814_Panorama
scene.title: Exhibition halls
scene.data: Area : 15.000m²[br][br] Spaces adapted to all types of configurations with independent access

scene.name: scene_Salle_Triangulaire_IMG_5443_Panorama
scene.title: Head of states summit great room

scene.name: scene_Resto_Vip_IMG_0250_Panorama
scene.title: VIP Restaurant
scene.data: VIP restaurant accommodate up to 230 guests[br][br]
